changeSet.author: nfleming
changeSet.comment: Columns to store Constellation URL per cloud project
changeSet.sql: alter table `prodlims`.`cloudproject` add column `constellationUrl` VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT NULL;

changeSet.comment: Columns to store Constellation URL on a ConstellationJob
changeSet.sql: alter table `prodlims`.`constellationjob` add column `baseUrl` VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT NULL; alter table `prodlims`.`constellationarchivejob` add column `baseUrl` VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT NULL;
